thread.title: Comedian Rhea Butcher Posts Deeply Personal, Heartbreaking Story In Response to Trump
thread.title_full: Comedian Rhea Butcher Posts Deeply Personal, Heartbreaking Story In Response to Trump

author: audra@dailydot.com (Audra Schroeder)
title: Comedian Rhea Butcher Posts Deeply Personal, Heartbreaking Story In Response to Trump
text:
Screengab via Seeso/YouTube BTW 
President Trump 's reversal of federal protections for transgender students in regards to public bathrooms has seen backlash from Apple , late night , the celebrity world , and Trump's own inauguration performer . 
On Thursday, comedian Rhea Butcher, star of Seeso 's Take My Wife , went further. Butcher, who identifies as non-binary , posted a lengthy Twitter thread about using public bathrooms, and how they're a "concentrated version of gender conformity." I've spent my entire life terrified of public bathrooms 1/ â€” Rhea Butcher (@RheaButcher) February 23, 2017 The whole thing is worth a read: Twitter
